questions.question_text: Why must a network engineer avoid usage of the default X509 certificate when implementing clientless SSLVPN on an ASA?

choices.C: The certificate must be managed by the local CA.
choices.D: The default X.509 certificate is not supported for SSLVPN.
choices.B: The certificate is regenerated at each reboot.
choices.A: The certificate is too weak to provide adequate security.

discussion.content:
Apply Call Admission Control (CAC) to the Internet Key Exchange (IKE) protocol. CAC limits the number of simultaneous IKE and IPsec security associations (SAs) that is, calls to CAC that a router can establish.

CAC Protection
- In-Negotiation Limit
- SA Limit

questions.question_text: Which technology can rate-limit the number of tunnels on a DMVPN hub when system utilization is above a specified percentage?
Which IKEv2 feature minimizes the configuration of a FlexVPN on Cisco IOS devices?
When you configure IPsec VPN High Availability Enhancements, which technology does Cisco recommend that you enable to make reconvergence faster?

discussion.content:
To configure DPD and IOS keepalives to be used in conjunction with the crypto map to allow for stateless failover, perform the following steps. 
crypto isakmp keepalive 10 3
This configuration causes a router to cycle through a peer list when it detects that the first peer is dead. Note: IKEv2 provides built-in support for Dead Peer Detection (DPD
